'''Tattered Paper''' is the name shared by two [[Quest Items]]:

#[[Tattered Paper (Washizu)]], an item left behind by [[Washizu]] after being slain in the [[World Quest]] ''[[Sinister Instruction]]''.
#[[Tattered Paper (Alphonso)]], an item left behind by [[Alphonso]] (Trofin Snezhevich) after being confronted in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Bad Guy in Vimara Village]]''.
